column1: '''The Steward of Gondor''' is the fifth track of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]'' by [[Howard Shore]]. It features [[Billy Boyd]] singing a brief song that has lyrics based off of the final two stanzas of [[A Walking Song]].
[[Category:The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]
